note:
My passion is creating community through effective and compassionate communication.

I am also in the process of dedicating my life to myself.

The ASCA (Adult Survivors of Childhood Abuse) community/meetings have been pivotal in my process as well as NVC (Non-violent communication)

If you or anyone you know has experienced childhood abuse please consider visiting the ASCA website. (This is not a 12-step based program.) Link below.

Pronouns: it/it's

"Love."

Pronouns: it/it's

Hello my dears. I'm And it/its. It's so nice to met you! (probably).

I have a, seemingly, undying faith in humanity despite a life full of abuse and trauma.

My passion is singing and dancing and drama/performing arts, speaking up and speaking out, defending the under dog, and using effective and compassionate communication to build strong and thriving communities.

The programs I most ascribe to are ASCA (Adult Survivors of Childhood Abuse) and NVC (Non-Violent Communication.

Even though I'm an anarchist I do a lot of of work and advocacy within the system.
